snippet: Verghese Kurien, who died this week at age 90, was one of India's most important social revolutionaries. His enterprising leadership in the national dairy industry helped India to become the world's largest milk producer.
abstract: Verghese Kurien, who died this week at age 90, was one of India's most important social revolutionaries. His enterprising leadership in the national dairy industry helped India to become the world's largest milk producer.
